## Projects

### PRPR.ONE (Personal Website)

A self-hosted website featuring an original interactive fiction game, built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript (frontend), Node.js/Express (backend), and CloudNativePG. Deployed on a home Kubernetes cluster with CI/CD, auto-scaling, and automated backups.

**[Visit -›](https://prpr.one)**

### The Lost Magic (Interactive Fiction)

![](./images/portfolio/galatea-wide.webp){style="float: right; margin: 10px;" width=20% .lightbox}

A proof-of-concept interactive novel inspired by Emily Short's Galatea. Built with web technologies and the Twine/SugarCube framework, featuring pre-rendered visuals and a branching narrative.

**[Visit -›](https://galatea.prpr.one)**
